function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of infectious diseases such as COVID due to home overcrowding","Impact":"Amplified transmission of COVID-19 and mental damage to residents","Mitigation":"Provide sufficient privacy and sufficient size for all persons to carry out basic activities of daily life","Technologies":"Home design and architecture, spatial planning","People":"Residents in overcrowded housing and housing with multigenerational families","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, policymakers"},{"Description":"Mental illnesses associated with overcrowding, such as anxiety, distress, depression, and social isolation","Impact":"Negative impact on mental well-being, productivity, and school performance","Mitigation":"Ensuring adequate home size and privacy, promoting mental health awareness and support services","Technologies":"Mental health support services, home design and architecture","People":"Residents in overcrowded housing and housing with multigenerational families","Owner":"Healthcare professionals, mental health organizations, policymakers"},{"Description":"Lack of additional space for quarantine room and attached bathroom for infected persons","Impact":"Difficulty in managing infected persons during quarantine","Mitigation":"Designating specific quarantine areas within homes, creating flexible living spaces, ensuring access to adequate sanitary facilities","Technologies":"Spatial planning, home design and architecture, sanitary engineering","People":"Infected persons and their families","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, policymakers"}]}
